content: this legal text discusses the division of a property located in sirolo between two parties referred to as amirn and amira the property consists of apartments shops and garages the parties agree to divide the property into two shares with each party receiving specific units the cadastral income and technical land registry details of each unit are provided the value of each share is stated as euro 100000 the parties acknowledge the need for permits and authorizations for any future changes to the property the text also mentions the inclusion of floor plans and map extracts that identify the specific units assigned to each party
